André Olbrich

Frederik Ehmke | formermembers=Thomas "Thomen" Stauch
Markus Dörk
Christof Theißen
Peter Frey }} '''Blind Guardian''' is a power metal band formed in the mid-1980s in Krefeld, Germany. The band takes inspiration from fantasy authors as well as traditional legends and epics. The 1998 album ''[[Nightfall in Middle-Earth]]'', most notably, is a concept album based on Tolkien's ''[[The Silmarillion]]''. Beyond projects that came to fruition, the band was at some point under negotiations for soundtrack work for [[The Lord of the Rings (film series)|''The Lord of the Rings'' film trilogy]].
